Class w3c.amaya.HTTPLink 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----w3c.amaya.HTTPLink
public class HTTPLink
extends Object
implements PropRequestFilter
Filter for grabbing LINK in HTTP header instead of the section of HTML documents.

manager
the HttpManager that installed us.

HTTPLink()

exceptionFilter(Request, HttpException)
This filter don't handle exceptions.
ingoingFilter(Request)
On the way out, we let the request fly through.
initialize(HttpManager)
PropRequestFilter implementation - Initialize the filter.
outgoingFilter(Request, Reply)
Catch any Link HTTP header and store it for later handling in the HTTPRequest associated to this Reply.
sync()
We don't maintain cached informations.

manager 
 protected HttpManager manager
the HttpManager that installed us.

HTTPLink 
 public HTTPLink()

initialize 
 public void initialize(HttpManager manager)
PropRequestFilter implementation - Initialize the filter. Time to register ourself to the HttpManager.

Parameters:
manager - The HTTP manager that is initializing ourself.
exceptionFilter 
 public boolean exceptionFilter(Request request,
                                HttpException ex)
This filter don't handle exceptions.

Parameters:
request - The request that triggered the exception.
ex - The triggered exception.
Returns:
Always false.
ingoingFilter 
 public Reply ingoingFilter(Request request)
On the way out, we let the request fly through.

Parameters:
request - The request about to be emitted.
outgoingFilter 
 public Reply outgoingFilter(Request request,
                             Reply reply) throws HttpException
Catch any Link HTTP header and store it for later handling in the HTTPRequest associated to this Reply.

Parameters:
request - The request emitted.
reply - The reply.
sync 
 public void sync()
We don't maintain cached informations.
